Import deepTools coverage matrix to normalizedMatrix

Source: R/platjam-import.R
deepTools_matrix2nmat.Rd

Import deepTools coverage matrix to normalizedMatrix

deepTools_matrix2nmat(
  x = NULL,
  filename = NULL,
  signal_name = NULL,
  target_name = "target",
  background = 0,
  smooth = FALSE,
  target_is_single_point = FALSE,
  signal_is_categorical = FALSE,
  mat_grep = "[-0-9]+:[-0-9]+",
  upstream_grep = "^[-]",
  downstream_grep = "^[^-]",
  target_grep = "^0$",
  verbose = FALSE,
  ...
)

Details

This function is under active development.
